website_summaries.verdict: Choose this soccer ball if you want one that stands out for its looks and is easy to play with; but you may want to check out some of its competitors on our list if you need a ball for serious competition.
pros: A good choice for youths and entry-level players, as those who enjoy playing a friendly game of soccer rave about its vibrant, neon color
cons: Like many in its class, it arrives deflated
May not hold up to pro-level play, as it needs to be inflated frequently and the seams are prone to breakage

customer_reviews.title: Feedback you requested
customer_reviews.text: The soccer ball did not hold air. I did not wsnt yo complain but since you asked repeatedly !!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Goodling

customer_reviews.title: Had ripped and deflated after two hours worth of use. Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the ball, great at first. But after a little over 2 hours worth of use i noticed that it already had some holes, after fiddling with it for a half hour i've come to the conclusion that its pointless to keep pumping air into it and threw it in the trash. The customer service was good though and they sent me a new one about a week after i complained.
customer_reviews.author: Wirtjo Leonard

customer_reviews.title: For my Dog
customer_reviews.text: 40 lb border collie chewed through the last one. She hasn't punctured this one yet after a few months of use, so good for her. I'm sure it's fine to play soccer with too.
customer_reviews.author: GModtheSire

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. But good customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Ball lasted 1 day before this happened. Disappointed. I contacted customer service and they emailed back right away and sending new ball. Hopefully this one lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rusch

customer_reviews.title: Great ball, but arrived a little flat
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my son to ensure he has a different ball then the rest of the players, we had our new bright ball switched out last season for a dirty, worn ball and want to avoid that. The ball that arrived was well packaged, bright orange as pictured and seems to be a well made product. Due to weather, he has not gotten a chance to play with it, so we’ll see how that goes. One note, it does not arrive inflated, so ensure you have a pump to inflate before playing.
customer_reviews.author: Kjt665

customer_reviews.title: Great product from a great seller.
customer_reviews.text: We've only gotten to use the ball a few times, but certainly have no complaints so far. Construction is flawless, size and weight are perfect. The best thing about the whole deal, though, is the support from the marketplace vendor - support throughout the process, including useful status updates with links to check on progress, shipping, etc. Will definitely use American Challenge again as our go-to online sporting goods retailer.
customer_reviews.author: WDUBZ

customer_reviews.title: They are nice balls, at first I was disappointed in the ...
customer_reviews.text: They are nice balls, at first I was disappointed in the ball, due to the shape a bit lopsided, but I added more air and it rounded out nicely. Bright in color and the kids like that.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Crazy Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love this ball. It's tougher and so much more durable than I expected. My order came in under 12 hours....that's warp speed fast! My daughter loved it and played with it immediately. The colors are brilliant! So vivid! And this company......I'm starting to believe they are time travelers. No one in this century does customer service this well....this polite....this caring....this professional. Genuine real good old fashion customer service done with excellence. Great product, great service, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Complete waist of time, tried to inflate and it leaked air worse than a sponge. Air leaked from every threaded joint.
customer_reviews.author: porfirio

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little skills ball
customer_reviews.text: Holds air well. The right size to goof around and keep your touch during a pandemic. It's really light so you can have fun making it swerve and bend and whatnot. Make sure you have neighbors that will throw it back over the fence or this thing will fly out of the yard and never be seen again. My dogs have had some fun carrying it around the yard after making a successful tackle on me and, while the cover is scuffed and dented, it hasn't gotten cut or lost any air. Oh, and it's ridiculously bright yellow. But that makes it easy to spot.
customer_reviews.author: DomLazz

customer_reviews.title: Too light but still ok
customer_reviews.text: My son (preschooler) have played with it for almost a month everyday. It is still look okay not worn out yet as other reviews menntions. However, the ball is too light. It was lighter than ball size 1 (addidas brand) that I have bought for my son to practice last time. So now we just let him play with this ball in the house with his sister. We preferred to let him play with standard ball in the ground. Since he need to work on his muscle and how to really control the actual standard ball.
customer_reviews.author: Krobiros

customer_reviews.title: Made the day for my little soccer superstar!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this size 4 soccer ball for my little soccer superstar. She was so excited to have the ball inflated (which was super easy!) so that she could head outside and begin practicing with it. She is new to soccer and this ball is the perfect fit and match for her. The size is great and the bright and vibrant colors of the Brasilia soccer ball make it easy to see and play with on our grass. I've been really impressed by the customer service provided by American Challenge since we purchased this soccer ball. They have followed through on everything they said that they would. I recommend them without reservation for your next soccer-related purchase. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: KKelly

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase and Recommend this Soccer ball to others
customer_reviews.text: Received Soccer Ball (Orange) on time. Came in box wrapped in plastic (see pic). Its been almost a month and my lil fella uses it for team practice twice weekly and plays n practices it with daily and the ball is still holding strong. So far we are very happy with this purchase and recommend this Soccer Ball to others.
customer_reviews.author: Shamon Family

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: We got a size 3, nice and small soccer ball for our preschooler. I don't know much about soccer ball sizing so I can't really comment on whether or not the size match what we got but the quality is definitely there. Very thick very sturdy and easy to blow up with a regular ball pump with a needle. Vibrant colors happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Quirkymama23

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and stays inflated!
customer_reviews.text: Previous soccer ball for my son deflated over night. This one hasn’t since it’s been inflated three weeks ago. It’s very stylish too. No kid on his 40+ kid practice squad has this ball, so it’s easier to find him!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy construction, vivid color
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement ball after our other one went into the lake. The bright blue color makes it easy to see during games and it has very sturdy stitching so I am sure it will last us for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Wood

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Besides the fact that they ship an uninflated ball with NO pump(pic 4), there was residue all over the ball (pics 2&3) along the design that wouldn’t come off and it was scuffed already(pic 1) I gave 2 stars overall because it is a pretty color but it’s a fairly disappointing item to receive. And yes, this is supposed to be a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lana W.

customer_reviews.title: Great soccer ball for my daughter.
customer_reviews.text: Great soccer ball for the price. It has lasted for two seasons and going strong. (Girls 13u soccer) My daughter also loves the color - more unique and makes it standout among all the other girls’ balls. I would definitely recommend this ball.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Wong

customer_reviews.title: I was buying this for my nephew's birthday and he loved it. A size four was a decent size ...
customer_reviews.text: The ball came deflated and matched to the color in the pictures (for the orange). I was buying this for my nephew's birthday and he loved it. A size four was a decent size for him to play with at 6 years old and with some of his younger family members. I pumped it up before giving it away and it held air, no leaks and the stitching held. As for how it has held up and the amount of use, i am not sure of.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Good quality ball. Value for money!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product as it was as advertised. Good quality and my 7 year old loved it instantly. A little hard to stop shots with (I should know as I play goalie when my son shoots) but this indicates the ball’s durability.
customer_reviews.author: S Prabhu

customer_reviews.title: It comes flat
customer_reviews.text: The ball looks great however I am 65 I do not keep equipment to blow balls up at my house so know before I can give it as a gift I must find someone who has the equipment to do this task. I am not buying the stuff to blow up this ball.
customer_reviews.author: Donna H.

customer_reviews.title: Soccer fanatic's favorite ball
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ball almost 3 years ago for my husband who plays soccer EVERY FREAKING WEEK and sometimes twice a week. He practices with it and it's the preferred ball for their matches. This balls has lasted and is in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Yesi

customer_reviews.title: Comes Deflated
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had come blown up so I could gift it right away. Felt awkward giving someone a flat ball, but she was still excited
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely flipped when I opened the box containing the soccer ball. Easy to inflate. We spend time dribbling around the apartment and using it at socially distance soccer practice [where she and her ball stand out].
customer_reviews.author: Gregorio Pedroza

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but hard to keep air in
customer_reviews.text: Ball seems a little heavy and it was not easy to inflate. Air kept leaking out when pin inserted. I am not a novice at inflating soccer balls. I bought the ball in pink and blue. Same review for both.
customer_reviews.author: Jean B. Carson

customer_reviews.title: Solid youth ball, but you need to inflate it
customer_reviews.text: Great ball with numerous size/ color options. We goofed and did not realize it would need to be inflated which created a scramble as we could not find a pump/ needle. Otherwise, great product...
customer_reviews.author: AMM

customer_reviews.title: This is such a great ball
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this ball so much, it is the best he has and he has many :)
customer_reviews.author: Sebastiana Buzila

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: My cousin is 12 years old and is spending his first year in a new town adjusting to a new school. His Christmas was rough but this gift put a huge smile on his face! The color is vibrant enough to play at sunset! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: My kids love these. Perfect size to play games with and ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these. Perfect size to play games with and the bright colors are great. Makes it easy to find the ball when they kick into bushes. Seem like good quality so far as well. They come deflated so you need to pump. Easy to do so though.
customer_reviews.author: j47

customer_reviews.title: Fun soccer ball
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandson and he was thrilled. As far as durability, I gave it a 3 because he just got it. Overall I’m very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Nice ball
customer_reviews.text: This ball holds air better than other ive had. My kids leave the ball in the car between practices. The old balls seemed to bleed off air. This ball doesn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Landon Swartz

customer_reviews.title: Made 3-year-old's day!
customer_reviews.text: This size 2 soccer ball was a gift for my 3-year-old granddaughter, and she loves it. She has only had it for a few days so I can't speak to durability, but it is very giftable, just make sure to order a pump also if the recipient doesn't have one. Very happy this came back in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: does not hold the pressure
customer_reviews.text: I used it once. I inflated it then it got deflated after one hour. Did not hold the pressure on further inflation
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift.
customer_reviews.text: I rated as 4 stars since I have nothing to evaluate the call by. I sent this as a gift to an out of state child. I don’t really have anyway to rate it, except to say that it arrived at my destination in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: L. J.

customer_reviews.title: Nice ball just make sure you get the size you asked for
customer_reviews.text: My daughter liked the ball. Unfortunately we ordered a size 4 and received a size 5. I didn't realize it until we had pumped air into it.
customer_reviews.author: Yola Cal

customer_reviews.title: Good ball overall
customer_reviews.text: Stitching is somewhat poor in a couple corners. Otherwise it's a nice ball. It holds air very well - I haven't put more air into it since purchasing 2.5 months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast ball on wet turf
customer_reviews.text: Nice ball, played with it for a few weeks before covid. Really like the speed of it on wet turf, can be very fast ball. Since I'm an adult with adult money, I already had a pump to pump it up because who wouldn't (it also held its air nicely)
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to inflate
customer_reviews.text: You will have to send me an equipment to inflate this ball or issue a refund. I even tried using the tire machine at the gas station and it didn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: frances

customer_reviews.title: Great looking product!
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the replacement ball as the 1st was defective and would not hold air. Amazon immediately sent a replacement once a return was requested. Shipping was no charge. Thank you Amazon and a American Challenge. Happy little 6 yr old soccer player!
customer_reviews.author: Randy Onysko

customer_reviews.title: This not a soccer ball it’s a handbal
customer_reviews.text: I believed I was getting a real size soccer ball for Christmas gift. This is more like a handball. Totally disappointed. Should not be advertised as a soccer ball. It’s a handball
customer_reviews.author: Carmelina

customer_reviews.title: Great Soccer Ball
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this soccer ball for my son to help him practice his dribbling and such. It is perfect! We are very pleased with this ball and are so glad we bought it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Dow

customer_reviews.title: Bday game disappointment
customer_reviews.text: WAY smaller than expected (it’s really small). It’s a ball, not a soccer ball. Holding up well in small kids. Bought for an outdoor 5 y/o birthday party soccer game setup but not game worthy.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Salmonson

customer_reviews.title: Rattle Ball
customer_reviews.text: This ball has something inside that rattles when the it moves around. I am thinking it is likely where they cut the ball to insert the fill valve and the trash went inside. Some of the graphics are rough and the ball is smooth. Neither issue is a real problem worth returning the but the ball shows quality and construction issues.
customer_reviews.author: Sports Guy

customer_reviews.title: My grandson likes it.
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my grandson who plays soccer on his schools team. He likes it so that means I'm satisfies.
customer_reviews.author: Mamma

customer_reviews.title: Get the biggest size!! 5
customer_reviews.text: Go for a size 5 trust me. I got a size 4 for my 7 year old and it was a bit small, size chart is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy customer
customer_reviews.text: It arrived two days late, I ordered it next day delivery because my daughter's school made a last minute decision to have fall soccer because of covid so she needed it for tryouts. I had to go to Target and buy an Adidas ball so she would have a ball for tryouts. When I opened it the ball was flat, not the biggest problem ever but a flat soccer ball is kinda useless.
customer_reviews.author: Dave lyon

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Crap fell apart right away waste of money even the 99 cent store products lost longer
customer_reviews.author: Truth

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be inflated but great quality ball.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this ball for Salvation Army gift for a girl tween. The ball seems durable and was easy to inflate and seems to be a good ball
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: Son loves this ball
customer_reviews.text: 7 year old needed a size 4 ball for U8 soccer practice. Both he and his 13 year old sister love the look of his new ball. He got the orange one. Looks great! Easy to find/see on the field. So far it seems to be good quality. It arrives uninflated so be sure to buy a pump if you don’t already have one.
customer_reviews.author: Kahawai73

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT COME INFLATED
customer_reviews.text: This ball does not come inflated. Also, much lower quality than expected.
customer_reviews.author: John Swift

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: So Far so good. I read missed reviews about durability. My son’s has used it a couple of times at practice and so far it’s good
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla R.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: High quality ball. Is exactly as pictured. Came quickly. My son is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: c.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic soccer ball for my kid
customer_reviews.text: My 9yo LOVES this ball. It's a REAL SOCCER BALL, not just a toy that will pop. I'd buy it again!!
customer_reviews.author: Gapeach

customer_reviews.title: Great for what it needs to be
customer_reviews.text: Nice small soccer ball for the kids to play with. We've kept it inside and played with a lot outside.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: I like the colorful ball and thought it would be great ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the soccer ball for my grandson for his birthday. I like the colorful ball and thought it would be great for locating the ball when playing. The ball arrived properly packaged, but unfortunately, it had a hole in it and would not hold air. We had to run to a local store and pick up a new ball so that he had it in time for his birthday. I requested a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Ouldhouse

customer_reviews.title: Great bright ball
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 3 year old who is just starting out playing, absolutely loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A sturdy soccer ball for a young athlete-princess
customer_reviews.text: Everything a smaller-size hot pink soccer ball should be. Well made, should last the season (we're talking little kids here!).
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: The soccer ball is perfect. This is the first year my grandson will ...
customer_reviews.text: The soccer ball is perfect. This is the first year my grandson will play soccer. I wanted one that he could easily determine was his. Now he can't wait to start the soccer season.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy from Missouri

customer_reviews.title: Skin peels
customer_reviews.text: The very thin skin on the ball starts to peel after only a month. It’s still useable, but not worth the price and it’s not easy to clean without the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Scintilla

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 and these are great game play and practice. Seams are well together, good weight, and is made with quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: ... son because it's very colorful and makes him feel like a big boy to have a big ball
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son because it's very colorful and makes him feel like a big boy to have a big ball. But it's really not very well made. When filled with air, the ball's not even round... It's a good price for a ball for just little kid play.
customer_reviews.author: betula

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 6yo son to start soccer lessons!
customer_reviews.text: My 6yo son loves it and the design so he can tell his ball apart from others in soccer lessons.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly H.

customer_reviews.title: ball was used
customer_reviews.text: ball was clearly used or thrown out of a moving truck one of the two. rubber seal is also missing where you inflate the ball. I have yet to put air in it but right out of the package its not looking good
customer_reviews.author: Cole Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great look.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality ball. My daughter likes the design and colors. We’ve had the size 4 for a couple of seasons and it has held up well. I expect the size 5 will as well.
customer_reviews.author: Momof2

customer_reviews.title: Nice ball
customer_reviews.text: The ball arrived on time, is vibrant in color, and appears sturdy. I do not know how well it will inflate or its durability since I am sending it out in a Samaritan's purse shoebox for Christmas. I do hope that it holds up well!
customer_reviews.author: KBF

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great ball - son loves it for his first year playing Soccer. Comes deflated but easy to inflate. Fast easy shipping and highly satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Good Soccer Ball
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to an 8-year-old who loved it. It is good quality, as bright as the pictures suggest, and otherwise as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great soccer balls for young children. My 2 done (2 & 4) are using them for their soccer league. Distinct colors and designs really stand out on the turf. They love them and we have been using them for a month already and they still look and function great!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Note - ball isn’t inflated
customer_reviews.text: They added that this ball comes deflated very far down in the information. All pictures show an inflated ball so I expected an inflated ball. Very disappointed . They should have made that clearer
customer_reviews.author: justine gillis

customer_reviews.title: They are good quality and decent price
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased these as practice balls for my son. He recently started playing on a team and these balls have helped improve his skills in soccer. They are good quality and decent price.
customer_reviews.author: gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Product quality is cheap
customer_reviews.text: Just got this ball and aired up ready to have girls soccer team sign for coach as a gift. Found a nice tear in the ball. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED ,MY GRAND DAUGHTER REALLY WANTED THIS GREEN BALL FOR CHRISTMAS
customer_reviews.text: OMG GOT THIS BALL BLOW IT UP TODAY AND WENT TO WRAP IT AND IT WAS DOWN SOME GOT MY HUSBAND TO SPRAY SOAPY WATER ON IT AND ITS LEAKING AIR IN THE SEAMS SO DISAPPOINTED FOR I DONT HAVE TIME TO GET ANOTHER HERE BY TOMORROW
customer_reviews.author: Mary S. Harless

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 7 year old niece after kicking her other ball by accident into the canal, my niece loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Gunn

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Gets black marks from kicking but top layer remains intact , good quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: mpc

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has used this ball for half a season. It holds air and the stitching has held up to practice. I subtracted one star because the stitching is not perfect from new. Overall I'd recommend it and I'd purchase the ball again.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes it. Can't stop playing with it, even at home.
customer_reviews.author: anita belokopytova

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice soccer ball. Color is very vibrant and holds air well.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: did not arrive inflated
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it 4 stars for the sole reason that I was not expecting it to arrive deflated. Fortunately, I own a pump and got right to it! It's otherwise a beautiful ball and my daughter loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Clara V Charlton

customer_reviews.title: Great Soccer Ball, Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Great Ball! Well Made, True to size. The color options and designs help make it stand out on the field and keep it separate from all the other balls.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren R.

customer_reviews.title: thinking a ball slightly smaller would be good for kindergarten aged children
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 2, thinking a ball slightly smaller would be good for kindergarten aged children. My mistake was that I didn't actually look at the measurement and measure with a ruler how big it would be. Pictures that show items to scale would be helpful for someone making a hasty purchase (teachers???). Otherwise, I really like the ball! Good quality and nice bright color!
customer_reviews.author: Trina Rymland

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Bright Colors
customer_reviews.text: Customer service was excellent. They emailed me when I had ordered the ball and also after I received the soccer ball. My son's favorite color is orange, so this soccer ball is perfect for him!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great color.  Nice ball.  Puppy ate it!
customer_reviews.text: Well it was great quality. The call came deflated gave it to my Grandson, he said yay a soccer ball but it’s flat! 1 hour later the 8 month puppy ate half the ball....I’m sure it would of been fun! Reordering
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Howard

customer_reviews.title: Tiiiiiiiny little thing - not regular soccer ball size
customer_reviews.text: Great super thick little ball but not at all soccer ball size. It’s tiiiiiiiiiny. Like a handheld ball. I thought it would expand or something when we blew it up but it’s just a dinky little ball. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Julie McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Pink Soccer Ball
customer_reviews.text: Ball received, very pretty pink for a young beginner soccer player. Still has to be inflated so hopefully all is good with it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan R Weisheimer

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Came deflated wish I had known that now I have to go buy an air pump what a waste of 17 bucks should've just gone to Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Deflated!
customer_reviews.text: If I would’ve known it was a deflated ball. Box was un-damaged so it was packaged deflated
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bomgardner

customer_reviews.title: It’s a soccer ball.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a kid who’s ball kept getting destroyed by some dogs I walked. He absolutely loves having a ball again.
customer_reviews.author: Amber-Lyn Bigelow

customer_reviews.title: Great soccer ball
customer_reviews.text: Just as d2scribed. My son got the orange and he loves it. Nice bright colors.
customer_reviews.author: JAB

customer_reviews.title: Flat, doesn't hold air.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last week! I inflated it and 2 hrs later it was flat. Thought maybe it need to stretch! Put more air into it. And flat again 2 hrs later.
customer_reviews.author: Rian Maxie

customer_reviews.title: Great service...thank you
customer_reviews.text: This product is a gift. The child's favorite color is green and it is a perfect soccer ball for a beginner. Thank you for your prompt service.
customer_reviews.author: kpin

customer_reviews.title: Cute and perfect for 5 year old!
customer_reviews.text: Love the ball. Perfect for my 5 year old who starts soccer this week. He loves the look and can’t wait to play!
customer_reviews.author: K. Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Gift for a hyper dog
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my mother’s dog. He loves it! It is sturdy and he has not popped it like the other 4 brand balls previously purchased
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S. Gilliam

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: This ball is being shipped to a child in a foreign country! Didn't inflate!
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Rubbish. Deflated the next day. Totally a waste off money and it is very small for a 6 years old
customer_reviews.author: victoria

customer_reviews.title: Nice soccer ball!
customer_reviews.text: Filled with air, ready for soccer practice! I'm sure it will be a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Bernstein

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: Great ball for my beginner player. My daughter loved the colors and picked it out when she saw it. Ball is very durable and should more than hold up for what we need.
customer_reviews.author: Ted King

customer_reviews.title: You have to inflate this when it arrives
customer_reviews.text: This item is a great color. However you have to blow it up when it comes- which is disappointing- because my son was waiting for it and wanted to play with it right away and we did not have an air pump.
customer_reviews.author: Anya Selner Tan

customer_reviews.title: Brillant Color Soccer Ball
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson loved this ball. The colors were brilliant and he was excited to receive this for a Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Terrific color scheme
customer_reviews.text: Great looking soccer ball. Easy to I flare and super colors. Kids are enjoying the ball and holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Alexwinsted

customer_reviews.title: Good Soccer ball
customer_reviews.text: You want to be a pro? Get this ball. Never played soccer in my life. But with this ball? I get mistaken for a MLS player all the time. Kicked it a few times, it works. These balls are good.
customer_reviews.author: SteveBuys

product_meta.title: American Challenge Brasilia Soccer Ball
product_meta.description:
American Challenge: A Brand You Can Trust. Since 1973 

This is a great youth ball.

OUTER CASING MATERIAL: 3.25mm TPU material

BACKING MATERIAL: 2 layers of poly/cotton lining

STITCHING: Machine stitched 

BLADDER: Hybrid SR bladder

This ball was designed for grass fields

The Brasilia ball is an entry level ball meant for youth players 

PLEASE NOTE: The balls do not come inflated.

STITCHING: Machine stitched - BLADDER: Hybrid SR bladder
This ball was designed for grass fields
